评论概述: Great quality and value for your money
评论详情: This is a very well made piece. It has plenty of pockets for all of my girl things and now I don’t have to carry everything in my hands. The material is great quality and the zipper works great too, it’s very comfortable and the size is perfect. I highly recommend if you’re looking for something that has plenty of space, pockets and is cute to carry around!
Just went on my first trip on a plane with the backpack and it worked great!  Functional and stylish and had all the room and pockets I needed!!  Great buy!!

This is a great backpack. I have received a lot of compliments! Lots of space. Very comfortable. Super cute. Been using it for a year and it is still very functional and has yet to break, especially with all of the books I have. I can even put my macbook in the very pack pocket! I definitely recommend!

I use it for college. Very good material.
Fits my 15” MacBook well. I’m only giving this 4 stars because if it gets a little heavy, the straps slip easily.

评论概述: Great bag but what came with it was disturbing
评论详情: I got this bag and it seems great but there are so many pockets that even several days after using it I randomly came across this old, dirty mouse pad stuffed away in one of the pockets. Creepy, haunted, cursed. Still a great bag 5/5.

This is the best backpack! Having had 100’s over my years, this one is definitely the best I have ever had! Great quality, very comfortable, lots of pockets and looks very classy…all at the same time. Just the best!
It is very spacious for its size,  with lots of pockets and pouches.  The only downside is that the straps are kind of short,  even when lengthened.  I am 5'6".

I brought another work backpack a year ago that cost about $200 and was already falling apart.  I decided to try this one because at this price-point, how can you not?  It is better than the more expensive one I had!  This has plenty of pockets and makes it easy to organize my stuff.  I can fit my work laptop and my tablet in here, as well as all the other things I need like my umbrella, bottle of water, wallet.  There is a small zipper pocket that can hold things you need immediate access to like a subway card, keys, etc.  And it is more stylish than the more expensive one I brought. So far, this can also take a banging.. it's elegant and stylish.  I've had people ask me where I got it.
I love this. I use it for school and gets the job done. Pretty durable too

评论概述: Stylish and Functional Backpack with Amazing Storage
评论详情: The LOVEVOOK Laptop Backpack for Women is fantastic! I absolutely love the white and tan color scheme—it’s stylish and elegant, though it does stain easily when traveling (which is expected with lighter colors).  The pockets and organizational features are a game changer. It’s incredible how much you can fit in this bag—it’s ridiculous in the best way! I haven’t used the built-in charger since I always carry a separate one, and I found the tissue pocket a bit odd. I also wish the side pockets were a bit bigger and deeper to accommodate my water bottle while traveling.  That said, the overall look, feel, and incredible storage capacity make this backpack a must-have. Highly recommend it for anyone looking for a chic yet practical travel companion!

评论概述: Loose straps and things fell out of side pockets.
评论详情: The bag was a great size and the pockets were great to fit a lot of different items in different compartments. I am returning it because the straps keep getting loose despite me tightening them, and the pockets on the outside kept losing my items. Multiple items fell out including water bottles and an umbrella.
I think this is super cute, I have had for a year and a half and mine had ripped multiple spots on the inside, idk if it’s just normal wear tho

评论概述: Durable and enough space to hold everything you will need

I bought this for my granddaughter for her birthday she lives it crosses the body and doesn't slip like a regular purse dies on your shoulder
This computer backpack is beautiful, have many Pockets and a charge cord already installed. Love the color and the material.

I absolutely LOVE this backpack!!! I was going to get white with the tan and I couldn’t be happier that I selected the purple. It’s beautiful. It has a strap to hold my laptop in place, space on the side for my backup battery pack, easy to secure to luggage and it’s the perfect size!!! I think I’m going to order another just so I have it. I love that it has a lot of compartments. It’s lightweight and comfortable enough to carry. I love the color! It seems a good quality. I carry it everyday to work. And might even be using it for travel  that’s versatility there.
Very nice product

I had this on my list for a while. I just came back from a trip and got the bag for it. It’s so pretty! And it doesn’t look strong but it is. I love all the pockets. I used a lot of them. There is a lot of space in this bag. I also put my house keys in the secret zipper part agd forgot. I was like “ I know I packed my keys”. I almost gave up- but I then remembered. If you’ve purchased this agd you can’t find something, please go check the back of your backpack in the back pack. You know where. You are welcome.  This bag will more than fit under the seat. I took United up and Frontier back home. No problems. I git one for my bestie. I let her pick the color. She loves hers too. I also love that it was easy to put on top of my suitcase to transport.
My bag ripped within a month of using it and the company is not responding.
Love the size of the bag but the straps are junk almost like stretched out. The other lovelock bag i had was wonderful and lasted this on i dont see making it another month. Which is too bad.

It’s easy to change up from my work gear to travel by just switching out a few items. I highly recommend this.
I'm in love with this bag it has so much room and I can't wait to take it on my flight coming up soon it fits everything I need in it. Very well made and easy to carry exactly what I was looking for.

As a college student and traveler this backpack is great and for a reasonable price! No issues or breaking, the adjustable straps do tend to slip but it’s not an issue for me as I usually carry it by the top straps.

I wanted a new backpack that was a bit more sleek and muted compared to my original North Face backpack, so when I saw these all over TikTok, I decided it was time to check it out!  Firstly, the color arrived as pictured and there are TONS of compartments and organization which I love! It fits all my notebooks, wallet, keys, chargers, stationary, laptop/iPad, etc.  My only complaint is that I wish the straps were a tiny bit more supportive because I feel like if my bag got too heavy, I’d be worried about them eventually wearing down. However, I’ve had this bag for about 2 months now and I cannot complain!
So many pockets in this backpack, helps keep my school stuff organized and holds so much. Has computer padding so I don’t worry about my computer breaking. The quality is so good!! Buy this!!

Just enough pockets to store laptop and other items. The only thing that I am worried about it the backpack straps are a little thin “where it connects to the bag” so I worry that if I pack too much it could pop.

评论概述: Very nice except the canvas straps
评论详情: The adjustment rings on the canvas part of the straps do not hold for more than 5 minutes if bag is heavy. I gave up tightening them constantly and just wear the bag loosely but it is a bother. If this was fixed, the bag would be 4 or 5 stars. Very nice quality otherwise. Shoulder pads are good. Zippers are smooth and it’s very spacious with many useful internal pockets, including a mesh zippered one for visibility. Never tried the plug attachment section.

The bag is a great size for travel, but the strap to attach to a suitcase handle is not stretchy and doesn't work. I have a smaller suitcase with a narrow handle and it didn't work. Other than that, the backpack was perfect for my iPad and books that I travel with.

I work at an elementary school and move classrooms throughout the day.  I always buy an inexpensive backpack on Amazon and use it for about 2 years before they need to be replaced.  So far this one is my favorite.  The laptop section is squishy enough to support the laptop which is one of important features to me.  I also love the second zipper with extra pockets for my other supplies.  The only negative is that the straps that tighten aren’t resistant enough to loosening so I have to tighten them every time I put it in.  Still not worth switching.  I love the colors of this bag too.
